channel.title: Epicurus-RSPS (official release)
channel.description:
Epicurus-RSPS is, and always has been, my final RSPS project. After 2 years of agonizing hosting, we have finally laid Epicurus to rest. I always told myself that I wasn't going to ever release the source code, because I felt the RSPS community didn't deserve it. But, I have had a change of heart. I think this source will benefit the RSPS community greatly, and I'd like to leave my legacy behind for others to learn from and enjoy.
Epicurus-RSPS was initially based off of my previous server project, Oldschool Online. Oldschool Online shared elements from SoulSplit, because at the time, I was a developer of both servers.
Credits:
Vince (founder of Oldschool Online) Pim (founder of SoulSplit) Lin (helped me with numerous issues, and he developed the interface editor which I used frequently) Kihomura (for helping me find issues in the pre-hosted version) Hazim Bishy
Thank you to everyone who was apart of the Epicurus community.
[b]Release:[/b]
The code Epicurus runs on is very mature. It has run flawlessly for the past 2 years. All bugs that arose during its hosting period were quashed.
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Grand Exchange[/li] [li]Flawless party room[/li] [li]Lottery[/li] [li]Dicing[/li] [li]Multiple world support[/li] [li]Cross-world player list support[/li] [li]Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently)[/li] [li]Flawless duel arena, with staking[/li] [li]Flawless shopping system[/li] [li]Flawless banking system, with searching.[/li] [li]Flawless farming system[/li] [li]PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc[/li] [li]Rank Icon changing system[/li] [li]Flawless loyalty title system[/li] [li]Flawless donator system[/li] [li]Refined item definition system[/li] [li]New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc.[/li] [li]Event schedule system[/li] [li]New character file system (credits to Lin for the format)[/li] [li]Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally)[/li] [li]Perfect curse system[/li] [li]Weapon combination selection in duel arena[/li] [li]Advanced MySQL system[/li] [li]Special client ::brony mode :)[/li][/ul]
And much, much more.
[b]Tools featured in the release:[/b]
[ul][li]AccountScanner - locates items on accounts.[/li] [li]AccountFinder - quickly finds an account you specify (was necessary when trying to look through 250k+ accounts) [/li] [li]BasicDecryptor - decrypts player passwords.[/li] [li]EpicurusRelayServer - relays data between words, player counts, chat, logins, etc.[/li] [li]EpicurusShopEditor - self explanatory.[/li] [li]EpicurusClueRewardEditor - self explanatory.[/li] [li]ScheduledEventManager - allows you to create/modify events (halloween events, christmas, etc)[/li] [li]EpicurusItemEditor - allows you to modify item bonuses, child ids, shop value, etc[/li][/ul]
[b]Note:[/b] All tools were programmed using C#, and because of this, require (at minimum) the .NET framework 3.5, which is available [url=http://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=25150]here[/url].
[b]Images:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaQ1[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaRC[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaSl[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaTi[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaTy[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaUj[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaYR[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gaZ9[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gb0H[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gb2c[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gb3d[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gb4E[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gb9y[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gbeb[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gbhX[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gbx4[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gbyb[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gbAh[/img]
[b]Downloads:[/b] [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!s9EhCCyC!Pklw1gCeBOxaE8K2d-jIaxaTnbtToel-C7Qd_klt5dg]Epicurus Server SRC (FIXED URL)[/url] [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!thN0DABb!NjJpWABgx4O72lZenl17NxfTp9Jxr4F7sXUzCZ88qFM]Epicurus Client SRC (FIXED URL)[/url] [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!Zp9SWRiS!CZfufmqv4Hu_mvo4wsf9XDr9KaoUcKz2ooSsnuhMNYA]Epicurus Client Cache (FIXED URL)[/url]
[b]Building:[/b] The project must be built through Eclipse. The .project and .classpath files still remain, so it shouldn't be too difficult.
~Signing off for the last time, Jayden Dombroski/JaydenD12/Jaydennn

item.description:
@djzone wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:97, topic:507372”][quote author=amin45 link=topic=625602.msg4343555#msg4343555 date=1375511233]
Could you possibly upload the MySQL Database Structure? Thanks in advance, Great source by the way.
[/quote]

I uploaded these to another RSPS community not long ago, here you go:

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

By anychance could you tell me where I could find your Highscores method?

Read full topic
